formula: a(n) = Sum_{ d divides n } phi(d)*2^(n/d)/(2*n) + either 2^((n-1)/2) if n odd or 2^(n/2-1)+2^(n/2-2) if n even.
maple: with(numtheory): A000029 := proc(n) local d,s; if n = 0 then RETURN(1); else if n mod 2 = 1 then s := 2^((n-1)/2) else s := 2^(n/2-2)+2^(n/2-1); fi; for d in divisors(n) do s := s+phi(d)*2^(n/d)/(2*n); od; RETURN(s); fi; end;
